  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Wrap call to (typically tablegenerated CCAssignFn).

This may be overridden to track additional state information as arguments are assigned or apply target specific hacks around the legacy infrastructure.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp/#l00090">90</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/gisel/aarch64calllowering-cpp">AArch64CallLowering.cpp</a>.
